PowerPoint

Exporting Powerpoint to PDF

Export PowerPoint slides to a PDF for a smaller file size and ensure that it is accessible for screen readers.

    Step 1: In the top menu click File and then in the left hand side menu select Export.



    Step 2: Select the Create a PDF/XPS Document to export the PowerPoint to PDF.



    Step 3: Click the Options button, check off "Document structure tags for accessibility", and click on "OK" then "Save".

Google Slides

Exporting Google Slides to PDF

When a PDF is directly exported from Google Slides, it does not contain any tagging for accessibility, meaning that formatting features such as tabular data, lists, headings, labeled images, and so on, will not be reliably conveyed by screen readers as a result.

    Step 1: Export the Googles Slides to a PowerPoint by selecting File and then download as Microsoft PowerPoint.

    Step 2: Open the PowerPoint, make any formatting edits, and follow accessibility best practices on AccessKit. Next, follow the steps for Exporting a PowerPoint to PDF.

Word

Exporting Word to PDF

Export Word documents to a PDF for a smaller file size and ensure that it is accessible for screen readers.

    Step 1: In the top menu click File and then in the left hand side menu select Export.



    Step 2: Select the Create a PDF/XPS Document to export the Word document to PDF.



    Step 3: Click the Options button, check off "Document structure tags for accessibility", and click on "OK" then "Save".


Google Docs

Exporting Google Docs to PDF

When a PDF is directly exported from Google Docs, it does not contain any tagging for accessibility, meaning that formatting features such as tabular data, lists, headings, labeled images, and so on, will not be reliably conveyed by screen readers as a result.

    Step 1: Export the Googles Docs to a Word document by selecting File and then download as Microsoft Word.

    Step 2: Open the Word document, make any formatting edits, and follow accessibility best practices on AccessKit. Next, follow the steps for Exporting a Word document to PDF.
